job_description: Executive/Sr. Executive ( Asset Management) : OnnoRokom Group Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List OnnoRokom Group Executive/Sr. Executive ( Asset Management) Application Deadline : 27 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 01 Age: 24 to 32 years Location: Dhaka (Kawran Bazar) Salary: Negotiable Experience: 2 to 5 years Published: 19 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education A bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance or Business Administration. A closely related discipline from an accredited institution is required. Experience 2 to 5 years Additional Requirements Age 24 to 32 years Proficiency in Asset Accounting Ability to generate asset reports utilizing Excel functions. Willingness to travel across the country for asset verification and audits as required, coupled with strong documentation and reporting skills. Responsibilities & Context OnnoRokom Group invites applications for the position of Executive/Sr. Executive, Operations (Fixed Asset Management) Department . This role involves comprehensive management of the company's fixed assets, ensuring accurate recording, tracking and reconciliation following company policies and financial standards. Accurately record all fixed assets within the Asset Management System. Ensure assets are correctly tagged and labeled upon acquisition. Assist with regular physical verification of fixed assets across multiple locations. Support asset addition, disposal, transfer, and revaluation processes. Ensure accurate documentation for asset acquisitions, transfers, and retirements. Reconcile physical assets with system records and investigate any discrepancies. The candidate should work collaboratively with Finance, Sourcing, and Branch Managers, and possess the ability to provide clear, effective guidance on asset management practices to Branch Managers. Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. Job Location Dhaka (Kawran Bazar) Read Before Apply Willingness to travel across the country for asset verification and audits as required. Special Need Teacher : Disabled Rehabilitation & Research Association (DRRA) Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Disabled Rehabilitation & Research Association (DRRA) Special Need Teacher Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: At least 30 years Location: Dhaka, Manikganj Salary: Negotiable Experience: At least 2 years Published: 19 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Bachelor/Honors Bachelor’s degree in Special Education is preferable Experience At least 2 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): NGO Freshers are also encouraged to apply. Additional Requirements Age At least 30 years Responsibilities & Context Special Teaching & Inclusive Classroom Support Deliver structured and adaptive teaching to children with Cerebral Palsy, Down Syndrome and developmental delays in inclusive and special learning environments. Develop, implement, prepare and review Individual Education Plans (IEPs) in collaboration with caregivers and multidisciplinary team. Support children’s participation in special classrooms alongside typically developing peers. Deliver lesson plans, teaching strategies, and assessment tools to meet diverse learning needs. Use visual supports, sensory adaptations, structured routines, and behavior support plans appropriate for Cerebral Palsy, Down Syndrome and ID. Communication, Behavior & Life Skills Development Support development of communication skills (verbal, non-verbal where applicable). Implement positive behavior support strategies and promote emotional regulation. Teach daily living, self-care, and social skills to improve independence and school readiness. Collaboration with Schools & Caregivers Work closely with special school teachers, school management, and classroom assistants to ensure reasonable accommodation for children with disabilities. Provide guidance and coaching to mainstream teachers on inclusive practices and classroom adaptation. Engage caregivers through regular meetings, counseling, and home-based learning guidance. Monitoring, Documentation & Reporting Maintain child profiles, IEPs, progress tracking tools, and attendance records. Conduct baseline, midline, and end-line assessments of learning and functional outcomes. Prepare monthly and quarterly progress and case reports for management and donors. Safeguarding & Child Protection Ensure a safe, inclusive, and child-friendly environment at all times. Promote dignity, non-discrimination, and gender-sensitive approaches. Compensation & Other Benefits Festival Bonus, Health Insurance and other
benefits as per organizational policy Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka, Manikganj Apply Procedure Email Your CV Send your CV to the given email recruitment@drra-bd.org Hard

Collaborate with field agents, vets, product teams, insurers, and external partners; align actions and close the loop on farmer issues. Stay abreast of new protocols/products and translate technical concepts into simple, actionable guidance for farmers. Listens attentively, responds respectfully, and maintains a farmer-first mindset—especially during distress (e.g., disease outbreaks). Applies structured thinking to incomplete information, prioritizes cases effectively, and makes safe, practical recommendations. Maintains accurate, timely records of interactions, follow-ups, complaints, and resolutions; ensures data integrity. Works smoothly across BRAC internal programmes and external stakeholders; builds trust and nudges action without authority. Manages high call volumes, shifting field realities, and seasonal surges; maintains quality under pressure. Experience Requirements: Minimum 4 years

job_description: Specialist, Agriculture (Crop), Agri Solution Hub; Microfinance Programme (Project Staff) : BRAC Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List BRAC Specialist, Agriculture (Crop), Agri Solution Hub; Microfinance Programme (Project Staff) Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Dhaka Published: 19 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Understanding of crop cycles, varietal selection, seed technology, and Good Agricultural Practices (GAP). Knowledge of symptoms, causal agents, and integrated management solutions. Familiarity with fertilizers, pesticides, biologicals, soil amendments, and safe handling protocols. Understanding of soil fertility, water management, and sustainable farming technologies. Knowledge of market pricing, value chains, risk management, and crop insurance concepts. Ability to assess symptoms, identify underlying issues, and recommend appropriate solutions. Skilled in providing clear, culturally appropriate verbal and written guidance to farmers and staff. Ability to document field findings, maintain client records, and prepare analytical reports. Proficient in handling inquiries, resolving complaints, and ensuring client satisfaction. Competence in conducting field visits, crop assessments, and hands-on demonstrations with farmers and field staff. Demonstrates empathy, responsiveness, and commitment to solving farmers’ problems effectively. Stays updated with agricultural innovations, market trends, and evolving technologies. Upholds BRAC values, promotes safeguarding practices, and ensures safe interactions with clients. Experience Requirements: Minimum 4 years’ experience in the development sector, especially in the Agricultural management service. Responsibilities & Context BRAC is an international development organization founded in Bangladesh that partners with over 100 million people living with inequality and poverty globally to create sustainable opportunities to realize potential. BRAC Microfinance provides people who cannot access traditional financial banking services with access to a suite of financial products including loans, savings, and microinsurance. Through this initiative, BRAC supports families to invest in income-generating activities, build assets, and reduce vulnerability to health and natural shocks. Working at BRAC is not like any other job. It is a platform where you can bring about real change for people who need it most. Join us to build a more financially inclusive society, where data and innovation drive impact. Application Insights View Requirements Responsibilities & Context Coordinate with customs officials to ensure timely clearance of goods. Handle submission of required documents, including Bills of Entry, invoices, and permits. Resolve discrepancies or disputes that arise during inspections. Verify the accuracy and completeness of shipping and customs documents. Ensure all necessary permits, licenses, and certifications are in place. Act as the primary point of contact between the company and customs officials. Collaborate with port authorities, transporters, and other stakeholders to expedite processes. Handle on-the-spot issues, including valuation disputes, duty adjustments, or other challenges. Escalate unresolved issues to higher management when necessary. Maintain detailed records of all customs transactions and clearance processes. Provide regular updates on the status of shipments to the operations team. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 30 to 45 years চাকরির প্রয়োজনীয় বিষয় সমূহঃ বয়স ৩০-৪৫ বছর। শুধুমাত্র পুরুষ প্রার্থী আবেদন করতে পারবে। আবেদনকারী অবশ্যই বিবাহিত হতে হবে। সৎ দক্ষ, কর্মঠ ও অভিজ্ঞ, বিনয়ী মার্জিত, আন্তরিকভাবে ব্যাক্তিগত গাড়ির চালক হতে আগ্রহী। আবেদনকারীদের উল্লেখিত ক্ষেত্রে পরিপূর্ণ অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে। গাড়ির সরঞ্জাম/যন্ত্রের পরিচালনা এবং রক্ষণাবেক্ষণ। গাড়ি রক্ষণাবেক্ষণে ৭-১৫ বছরের অভিজ্ঞতা। চমৎকার যোগাযোগ দক্ষতা। চাপের মধ্যে কাজ করতে সক্ষম, ভদ্র এবং ভালো আচরণ। অরিজিনাল জাতীয় পরিচয়পত্র ও বৈধ ড্রাইভিং লাইসেন্স থাকতে হবে লাইসেন্স এর বয়স সর্বনিম্ন ৭ বছর হতে হবে। নতুন গাড়ি প্রতিদিন পরিষ্কার রাখতে হবে। Responsibilities & Context একজন বিশিষ্ট  বিশেষজ্ঞ ডাক্তারের উল্লেখিত পদ পূরণের জন্য অবিলম্বে নিয়োগের জন্য উদ্যমী, নিবেদিত এবং কঠোর পরিশ্রমী ড্রাইভার খুঁজছেন যারা হোন্ডা সিআরভি , মার্সিডিজ বিলাসবহুল গাড়ি চালাতে পারে। ব্যক্তিগত মালিকের জন্য একজন ড্রাইভার প্রয়োজন চাকুরি স্থানঃ ঢাকা (বনানী, রোড নং-১১) চাকরির ধরনঃ ফুল টাইম কর্মদিবসঃ প্রতিদিন Compensation & Other Benefits বেতনঃ ২৫,০০০/- পঁচিশ হাজার টাকা মাত্র) প্রতিদিন হাত খরচ বাবদ ১০০ টাকা দেওয়া হবে। সর্বমোট=২৮,০০০/- কোম্পানীর সুযোগ সুবিধাঃ বিনামুল্যে থাকার সুব্যবস্থা (বেড, লাইট, ফ্যান) সহ সম্পূর্ণ আলাদা রুম এ কর্মস্থলে থাকতে হবে। ঈদ বোনাস ১২ মাস পরে কার্যকর। (দুই ঈদ মিলে এক মাসের পরিমান বেতন প্রদান করা হবে) দুই বছর পর বেতন বৃদ্ধি করা হবে। (১০% হারে) রান্নাঘরে রান্না করে খাবারের সুবিধা। Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Strong knowledge of ERP systems and financial/accounting software. Experience with IT Audit, ERP/System Audit, or Technical Compliance in RMG/Manufacturing. Good understanding of Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC). Knowledge of Software QA, database systems, and IT security principles. Responsibilities & Context Interstoff Apparels Ltd. is one of the largest apparel companies in Bangladesh, which focuses on a large volume of Exports abroad. The Organization began its journey in 2002. which composites through knitting, Dyeing, Sewing, printing, and embroidery. Interstoff Apparels Ltd. provides an outstanding professional growth environment for its employees. In these circumstances, we are looking for a candidate who is energetic, professionally goal-oriented, and well-mannered. Job Summary This position ( System/ERP/IT Auditor) will be responsible for auditing ERP systems, financial applications, production software, and IT infrastructure used in the garments/RMG environment. The role will ensure data accuracy, financial system integrity, software development compliance, and adherence to internal controls, audit standards, and corporate governance requirements. Key Responsibilities 1. IT & ERP System Audit (RMG Environment) Audit ERP systems (Accounts, Commercial, HR, Payroll, Production, Inventory). Review system configurations, access rights, and approval workflows. Verify integration between production, inventory, and financial modules. Assess IT general controls (ITGC) within corporate systems. 2. Financial System & Accounts Data Audit Verify financial transactions within accounting software and ERP. Ensure data accuracy between accounts, inventory, and production systems. Review automated financial reports and system-generated MIS reports. Identify duplicate entries, system errors, or financial data discrepancies. 3. Software Development & Change Management Audit Review in-house software development for factory operations or corporate use. Evaluate SDLC processes including development, testing, and deployment. Audit system updates, patch management, and change approval processes. Ensure proper documentation and version control practices. 4. Data Integrity & Security Evaluate data backup, disaster recovery, and cybersecurity

The company are sincerely created an ideal safe working environment and dignified profession for all employees of the organization through practicing integrity, nurturing ability, sincerity, positive attitude, and fairness. Akij Insaf various industrial products have already managed to attract positive attention among customers across the country. The company is known for its diversified business portfolio, including Food, Textile, Printing & Packages, and Life style products. Now, we are seeking a dynamic & energetic person to join us as “Senior Officer/Assistant Manager - Internal Audit (Factory Operation)” . Audit the procurement process for key ingredients, ensuring quality specifications, competitive pricing, and supplier performance reviews. Assess production yield, recipe adherence (RM consumption vs. standard), line efficiencies, and wastage management in a high-volume, fast-paced environment. উদ্যমী এবং যোগ্যতাসম্পন্ন প্রার্থীদের নিম্নলিখিত পদে আবেদনের জন্য আহ্বান করা হচ্ছে। কাজের স্থান: নিজ এলাকা দায়িত্ব ও কর্তব্য: নিজ এলাকায় এমক্যাশ (mCash) সেবা প্রদান করে প্রয়োজনীয় প্রচার ও প্রসার করা। Project Brief: The AI Literacy and Applied AI Skills Project aim to equip educators, MSME workers, NGO professionals in Bangladesh with practical and responsible AI skills to improve productivity, employability, and service delivery. Implemented by BRAC Education Programme (BEP) in collaboration with BRAC Learning and Leadership Development and BRAC Social Innovation Lab , and supported by Google.org and ADB through the AVPN Opportunity Fund , the project focuses on integrating AI literacy into real-world professional and training contexts. The training covers foundational AI concepts, hands-on use of AI tools, advanced prompting techniques, and responsible and ethical AI practices. Content is contextualised for different user groups, including lesson planning and assessment support for educators, business operations and digital marketing for MSMEs, and operational and communication tools for NGO and community-based professionals. The project uses a blended delivery model , combining self-paced online learning through BRAC’s LMS with live virtual and in-person facilitation. Key Responsibilities Lab Analysis: Conduct chemical analysis (Wet Analysis) of raw materials and finished products. NIR Operation: Operate and maintain the NIR machine for rapid nutritional testing. Standardization: Prepare and review SOP (Standard Operating Procedures) , specifications, and methods for all materials and goods. Compliance: Follow safety protocols and Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) at all times. Reporting: Report all findings and daily progress to the Lab In-Charge . Collaboration: Coordinate with senior management on quality improvement initiatives. Process Oversight: Monitor the production floor to ensure feed manufacturing meets all physical and nutritional specifications. সিস্টেমের সাথে পরিচিতি থাকলে অগ্রাধিকার দেওয়া হবে শক্তিশালী বিশ্লেষণী, যোগাযোগ ও টিমওয়ার্ক দক্ষতা ফুড সেফটি এবং কর্মক্ষেত্রের স্বাস্থ্য-নিরাপত্তা-পরিবেশ (HSE) বিষয়ে মৌলিক জ্ঞান। Responsibilities & Context মূলদায়িত্বসমূহ: ভোজ্য তেল রিফাইনিং প্রক্রিয়াপরিচালনা ও পর্যবেক্ষণ করা। SOP অনুযায়ী প্রক্রিয়ার প্যারামিটার (তাপমাত্রা, চাপ, ভ্যাকুয়াম, কেমিক্যালডোজিং) নিয়ন্ত্রণ করা। প্ল্যান্টের স্টার্ট-আপ, শাটডাউন এবংজরুরি পরিস্থিতি মোকাবেলায় সহায়তা করা। সর্বোচ্চ উৎপাদন ও সর্বনিম্ন ক্ষতিনিশ্চিত করা, বিশেষ করেঅনাকাঙ্ক্ষিত (ডেড) লস কমানো। পণ্যের গুণগত মান পর্যবেক্ষণ করাএবং প্রয়োজনীয় সংশোধনমূলক ব্যবস্থার Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 22 to 45 years Responsibilities & Context মার্জিত পোশাক পরিধান করে সময় মত কাজে উপস্থিত হতে হবে। দায়িত্বরত অবস্থায় প্রতিষ্ঠানে আগমনে ও প্রস্থানে সার্বক্ষনিক সতর্ক দৃষ্টি রাখা। সন্দেহজনক কাউকে মনে হলে বিনয়ের সাথে নিরাপত্তা চৌকিতে এনে বিশেষভাবে তল্লাশি করতে হবে। মালিকানাবিহীন কোন ব্যাগ বা কার্টুন পাওয়া গেলে দ্রত প্রয়োজনীয় ব্যবস্থা গ্রহণ করতে হবে। হসপিটালের সামনে গাড়ী ও রিক্সার যেন জ্যাম তৈরি না হয় সেদিকে বিশেষভাবে লক্ষ্য রাখা। সিকিউরিটি গার্ডদের দায়িত্ব, কর্তব্য ও দায়িত্ব স্থান নির্ধারন করে দেয়া। সার্বক্ষনিক ভবনের চারপাশ ও ভবনের অভ্যন্তরে রাউন্ড প্রদানের মাধ্যমে নিরাপত্তা নিশ্চিত করা। সময়ে সময়ে সিকিউরিটি গার্ডদেরকে প্রতিষ্ঠানের নীতিমালা বিষয়ে অবহিত করা। বিভিন্ন ফ্লোরে দায়িত্ব পালন অবস্থায় নীতিমালা অনুযায়ী রোগীর এ্যাটেনডেন্ড এর প্রবেশ নিয়ন্ত্রনের বিষয়টি নিশ্চিত করা। উদ্ধর্তন কর্মকর্তা, কর্মচারী এবং রোগী ও রোগীর এ্যাটেনডেন্ডদের সাথে মার্জিত আচরণ করতে হবে। হসপিটালে আগত রোগী বা রোগীর এ্যাটেনডেন্ড কিছু জানতে চাইলে তথ্য দিয়ে সহযোগীতা করা। ম্যানেজার/প্রশাসন কর্তৃক নির্দেশিত এতদসংশ্লিষ্ট যে কোন দায়িত্ব পালন করা। Compensation & Other Benefits Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize Salary Review: Yearly Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. Commercial Executive (Export-Import) : Esquire Group Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Esquire Group Commercial Executive (Export-Import) Application Deadline : 20 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: 01 Age: 25 to 35 years Location: Narayanganj Salary: Negotiable Published: 19 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 25 to 35 years Diploma or Certificate in: Export–Import Management Customs & Bond Management VAT & Taxation Supply Chain Management Good knowledge of: Bangladesh Customs Rules Bond License procedures LC documentation ERP systems Responsibilities & Context Esquire Knit Composite PLC is a leading knit composite and ready-made garment (RMG) manufacturer in Bangladesh, fully focused on export markets with state-of-the-art facilities from yarn dyeing to finished garments. The company serves major international buyers and emphasizes quality, compliance, and timely delivery. The organization is looking for the Commercial Executive – Export & Import will manage end-to-end export and import commercial operations for the RMG business. Prepare and verify all export commercial documentation (Invoice, Packing List, EXP, BL/AWB, Certificate of Origin, GSP, SAFTA, REX, EPB documentation). Ensure accuracy of Bills of Lading and other shipping documents; collect originals as needed. Follow up on export documentation acceptance and export proceeds realization. Process import documentation, LC opening, amendments, and settlement with banks under Bangladesh Bank import policy. Coordinate customs clearance and release of imported raw materials, trims, and machinery parts. Maintain accurate records of import costs, duties, and taxes for commercial reporting. Coordinate with suppliers, freight forwarders, and internal departments to ensure on-time delivery of imports. Handle LC documentation and negotiation with banks for export and import transactions. Ensure compliance with Bangladesh Bank, customs, BGMEA/BKMEA guidelines, and relevant trade regulations. Prepare periodic commercial reports and MIS on export/import status for management review. Maintain accurate filing and record-keeping of all export and import documents. Ensure data accuracy in ERP/commercial systems. Deputy Manager – ICC (Internal Control & Compliance) : Akij Resources Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Akij Resources Deputy Manager – ICC (Internal Control & Compliance) Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 19 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Minimum 2–3 years in Internal Audit, Compliance, Risk Management, or Regulatory function Prior exposure to regulators, certification bodies, or external auditors preferred Responsibilities & Context Develop and maintain a comprehensive enterprise-wide compliance inventory covering regulatory, statutory, contractual, operational, and standards-based obligations. Identify and document applicable regulatory laws, industry-specific legal requirements, bank covenant obligations, and fiscal compliance requirements. Ensure structured coverage of tax, trade, customs, environmental, labor law, ESG, sustainability, SOP, internal policy, ISO / IMS, and data protection compliance requirements. Integrate compliance obligations with the enterprise risk register to ensure risk visibility and alignment with enterprise risk management practices. Assess and quantify potential regulatory, financial, and reputational exposure resulting from compliance gaps or control weaknesses. Map compliance gaps against defined organizational risk appetite and tolerance thresholds. Establish clear ownership for each compliance obligation across functional stakeholders and business units. Define measurable compliance KPIs and monitoring indicators to track compliance effectiveness. Determine monitoring frequency, review cadence, and validation mechanisms for different compliance domains. Develop structured compliance dashboards and reporting tools to support management oversight and decision-making. Define timelines and accountability for corrective and preventive actions arising from compliance reviews and audits. Monitor remediation progress through structured tracking mechanisms and maintain compliance issue logs. Escalate critical, recurring, or overdue non-compliance issues to the Head of Internal Audit and relevant management forums. Skills & Expertise Data analysis ERP Software MS Excel MS Power BI Compensation & Other Benefits T/A,Provident fund,Mobile bill,Medical allowance,Insurance Festival Bonus: 2 Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka Job Highlights Design and operationalize a structured 360° compliance management framework to ensure complete visibility and control over regulatory, financial, contractual, policy, and standards compliance while proactively mitigating enterprise compliance risks. Fabrics Limited Management Trainee - Planning (RMG) Application Deadline : 21 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 3 Age: 25 to 28 years Location: Gazipur Salary: Negotiable Published: 19 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 25 to 28 years 1-2 years of experience can also apply who have very good skill in mentioned responsibilities. Good Communication skills Responsibilities & Context Overview: The New Asia Group is comprised of six entities forming a vertically-integrated apparel manufacturing organization, headquartered in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Established in 1987, the Group began with Rahim Textile Mills and has since expanded into producing greige yarn, denim fabric, knitted garments, sweater garments, and denim garments. We manufacture apparel for over 25 of the world’s most well-recognized brands and export our products to more than 10 countries across four continents. Our vision is to transform the image of the “Made in Bangladesh” label. The New Asia Group stands out due to our fully owned vertical manufacturing facilities, which include yarn spinning, fabric production, garment finishing, and value-added services like washing, embroidery, and printing. This vertical integration allows us to offer reduced lead times, flexibility, agility, and full traceability across our diverse product range, which includes casual knitwear, sweaters, denim, and intimates for men, women, and children. We take pride in being a socially responsible employer, launching numerous employee-benefit schemes such as a micro-health insurance scheme and an education fund for workers` children. We believe that our competitive advantage lies in our ability to provide a comprehensive set of "fibre-to-garment" solutions, ensuring the highest quality standards and on-time delivery. We are seeking a compatible Management Trainee (Planning) who will work for our Seamless Garment factory, J.M. Fabrics Limited at Rajendrapur, Gazipur and who meets the following Criteria: Key Responsibilities: Dynamic Dashboards: Creating interactive reports using Slicers, Timelines, and Pivot Charts to filter data by customer, product category, or production line. Conditional Formatting: Designing heat maps and alerts (e.g., highlighting lines operating below 85% efficiency or raw materials with less than three days of cover). Sparklines: Displaying quick visual trends of hourly or daily production output directly within data tables. VBA (Macros): Automating the generation and distribution of daily production reports (DPR). User-Defined Functions (UDF): Developing custom formulas for garment-specific calculations, such as yarn consumption per garmen

Reporting to: Project Coordinator / CBR Officer. Job Location: The position is based in Parbatipur Upazila of Dinajpur District and with regular travel to upazila and union level for implementation of project activities smoothly. Job Responsibilities: Identification and Referral of Children and Youth with Disabilities Conduct community surveys and home visits to identify children, youth and other disabilities to connect with social support, rehabilitation services, and relevant government schemes. Facilitate early identification of disabilities and promote timely intervention measures. Refer identified individuals to appropriate rehabilitation services, including tele-rehabilitation and center-based rehabilitation service. Follow up with referred individuals and their families to ensure access to care and support. Community Engagement and Awareness Sensitize communities to change perceptions and attitudes toward disability through advocacy and awareness campaigns. Promote inclusion and participation of children with disabilities in schools and community activities. Support households and communities in understanding prevention, early identification, referral, and follow-up for disabilities. Bilateral supervision to community interns in their day-to-day activities in coordination with CBR officer. Field Implementation and Program Support Facilitate community-level activities such as medical camps, skills training, and awareness sessions and yard meetings. Arrange and coordinate tele-rehabilitation services in coordination with CBR interns. Maintain accurate records and child datasheets, aligned with project standards. Participate in planning, organizing, and reporting of community outreach activities. Local Collaboration and Resource Mobilization Coordinate with local government authorities, NGOs, and service providers to deliver interventions for CYwDs. As one of the leading real estate companies of Bangladesh, we take pride in our code compliant designs and quality construction, and have built over 4300 apartments and commercial units in Dhaka city in the last 37 years. Department: Call Center & Data Management Job Responsibilities Answer incoming & outgoing calls in a timely manner, addressing customer needs or inquiries effectively. Maintain regular reports on calls, lead generations, call findings and interactions. Achieve Monthly targets. Work closely with sales team to analyze market trends. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements In-depth understanding of fish culture practices, including pond preparation, stocking densities, species-specific requirements, and water quality management. Knowledge of common fish diseases, mortality indicators, and biosecurity protocols to provide accurate "basic advisory support." Familiarity with aquaculture insurance products, claim processes, and the integration of microfinance within rural development. Understanding the roles of the Department of Fisheries (DoF), government regulations, and the various internal programs (e.g., BRAC AI, UPG). Understanding how CRM (Customer Relationship Management) systems and MIS databases function to ensure accurate reporting. Ability to convey complex technical information clearly via phone, email, and chat to both rural farmers and corporate stakeholders. Skill in diagnosing pond management issues based on farmer descriptions and knowing when to escalate to a specialist. Proficiency in conducting on-site visits, using survey tools, and gathering "hands-on" data from remote locations. The ability to synthesize call logs and farmer feedback into actionable reports and insights for service improvement. Skill in handling complaints and "de-escalating" frustrated clients while maintaining professional boundaries. The ability to build trust with rural farmers by using appropriate language, tone, and showing genuine concern for their livelihoods. Identifying potential risks—like disease outbreaks or insurance gaps—before they become crises and taking initiative to alert stakeholders. Navigating a complex network of internal teams and external partners (donors, regulators) to ensure a seamless service experience. The flexibility to switch between a high-volume call center environment and physically demanding field visits in rural areas. Meticulousness in recording farmer data and pond details, ensuring that "claims and payment processes" are handled without error. Experience Requirements: Minimum 4 years’ experience in the development sector, especially in the fisheries management service.
